TopicTitle: Warp to Maneuver Node: wrong warning message

Articles.Content:
• in flight
  • go to map view
  • set maneuver point
  • click button "warp to maneuver"
    -> when you get close to the maneuver node this message appears: "Timewarp limited to proximity to celestial body"

expected: "Timewarp limited to proximity to maneuver node"

_______________________________________________________________
game version:
0.1.1.0.21572

OS:
Windows 11

GPU:
NVIDIA Geforce RTX 3090

CPU:
Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-12900K   3.20 GHz
